Tab1Text1:
Welcome to the ARK Odyssey Cluster of Maps




We host every official map on this cluster to include: The Island, The Center, Scorched Earth, Ragnarok, Aberration, Extinction, Valguero, Genesis 1, Crystal Isles, Genesis 2, and Lost Island.



Rules, Rates, Settings, MODs, and Plugin info can be found in this UI.



Additional buttons below allow you to join us in Discord, visit our ARK Bot page, support our community and also create your own tribe page!!!



                                   If you enjoy playing here consider inviting others to come play.
